text: ATN Pres Trump @realDonaldTrump  #Chloroquine IS THE CURE for #coronavirus - @DonaldJTrumpJr  @EricTrump @IvankaTrump @govmikehuckabee Already available in pill form for last 50 years to treat malaria - China & South Korea used it for the virus. ‘Effective treatment’ study says. https://t.co/gGoHXrt8HR
